name: template-fullstack
description: project template for the React-Express-MySQL cursus in Wild Code School

scripts.postinstall: cross-env-shell "husky install && cd ./frontend && $npm_package_config_cli install && cd ../backend && $npm_package_config_cli install" && cd ../admin && $npm_package_config_cli install"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n front,back,admin -c green,yellow,cyan -t "HH:mm:ss" -p "{name} {time}" "npm --prefix ./frontend run dev" "npm --prefix ./backend run dev" "npm --prefix ./admin run dev"
scripts.lint: cross-env-shell "cd ./frontend && $npm_package_config_cli run lint && cd ../backend && $npm_package_config_cli run lint"
scripts.fix: cross-env-shell "cd ./frontend && $npm_package_config_cli run fix && cd ../backend && $npm_package_config_cli run fix"

author: Wild Code School
